I hope you will not, brethren, hold yourselves aloof because you may not be heartily received and find all sociable and ready to engage in conversation. Courteously, humbly, press your way, gain the confidence by showing an interest in their temporal concerns, then watch your opportunity 


                                       -42- 

to speak of the interest of the cause and of the precious truth. May God help you to see just what needs to be done.
